summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department, granting a non-exclusive easement for ingress, egress and road maintenance over the City of Seattle's fee-owned patented lode mining claim (Alameda Lode) in the southeast quarter of Section 27, Township 40 North, Range 43 East, W.M., Pend Oreille County, Washington (P.M. \#404335-2-301).
